description:
Turn your lawn into a Green Machine

Available only in Sunday Lawn Plans & Retail

Green Machine is a nutrient-rich fertilizer formula designed to initiate growth, maintain season-long health and enhance deep green color.

This formula is tailored to support your lawn through its growth stages, fostering deep rooting and resilience. Green Machine provides a powerful combination of high nitrogen, seaweed extract, and iron, ensuring your lawn not only grows quickly but also develops healthy green grass.

Consciously formulated without pesticides, Sunday champions planet-friendly solutions for your lawn's unique environmental challenges.

sections.product_features:
22-0-3 NPK (Nitrogen-Phosphorus-Potassium) liquid lawn fertilizer
Specially formulated for growth, deep rooting, and greening
Ideal for initiating early-season growth and regular maintenance
Enriched with nitrogen for growth, seaweed extract to improve heat tolerance and iron to deepen the green hue of your grass
Made for all types of grass and lawns
Zero pesticides
User-friendly hose-on application
Covers up to 5,000 sq. ft.
Includes liquid fertilizer in flexible reduced plastic packaging and a custom-engineered universal hose-end sprayer
sections.ingredients:
Nitrogen: For vigorous grass growth
Seaweed Extract: Enhances greening, resilience and heat tolerance
Iron: Supports deep greening of the lawn
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply early morning or evening, and make sure your lawn is adequately hydrated. Avoid use on drought-affected or heat-stressed lawns.
Connect the universal sprayer to your hose and the fertilizer pouch. This sprayer is designed for the optimal mix of water and nutrients.
Apply the fertilizer across your lawn until the pouch is empty, which should take about 10-15 minutes. Once the fertilizer dries, you can get back out on your grass.
Reapply every 4-6 weeks spring through fall. Keep the sprayer for future applications.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
How to Use with Other Sunday Products
If using other Sunday products, let liquid fertilizers dry completely before applying anything else to the lawn. For best results, use lawn fertilizer in combination with weed control and grass seed. This will help you feed properly, reduce weeds, and introduce better grasses to your lawn.
How does fertilizer help my grass? How is Sunday liquid fertilizer different?
Grass needs nutrients to thrive. Fertilizer provides these essential nutrients and enhances growth, color, and resilience. Sunday liquid fertilizers offer rapid absorption for quicker results and uniquely enrich the soil while nourishing your lawn—all without pesticides for a healthier yard.
How much lawn fertilizer will I need?
For each treatment: Each fertilizer pouch covers 5,000 sq. ft. for one treatment. The number of pouches you receive for each application will depend on your lawn size.
For the growing season: We’ll take care of this for you! Follow your Sunday Custom Plan for how many times per year to apply.
When is the best time to apply fertilizer to my lawn?
For optimal results, fertilize your lawn when grass is actively growing. Apply early in the morning or the evening when temperatures are between 50 to 85 degrees F to a well-hydrated lawn.
For custom lawn plan subscribers: Head over to your account’s My Plan Page to see when to apply your custom nutrient pouches.
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
This product is approved for use in all states, except VA.
